main event: Numerous sightings of small circular metallic or luminous objects reported in Argentina over several months in 1962.
interesting points: Various observers reported seeing objects moving rapidly and silently through the sky., Some objects were described as spherical and surrounded by a luminescent glow., Reports included sightings by military personnel and civilians., The objects exhibited unusual behavior, such as sudden changes in direction and speed., A significant increase in UFO sightings was noted throughout Argentina during this period.
sighted object: small circular metallic or luminous objects
